channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Vidéo : ce drone imprimé en 3D est officiellement le plus rapide du monde
item.description: Vous trouviez votre DJI Avata rapide en mode Sport ? Oubliez tout. Luke et Mike Bell, deux Youtubers, viennent de reprendre le record du monde avec le Peregreen V4. Vitesse enregistrée : 657 km/h.

item.title: If you ever doubted SteamOS, think again – this new Decky Loader plugin is possibly the best one yet
item.description: Gaming on SteamOS has just been made much easier, thanks to a new Decky Loader plugin that fits multiple game libraries into one.

item.title: AI Tool Reportedly Sent ICE Recruits Into the Field Without Proper Training
item.description: Department of Homeland Security's AI initiatives in action...

item.title: Raspberry Pi’s new add-on board has 8GB of RAM for running gen AI models
item.description: Raspberry Pi is launching a new add-on board capable of running generative AI models locally on the Raspberry Pi 5. Announced on Thursday, the $130 AI HAT+ 2 is an upgraded - and more expensive - version of the module launched last year, now offering 8GB of RAM and a Hailo 10H chip with 40 […]

item.title: Amazon is turning Fallout’s postapocalypse into a reality show
item.description: Move over Squid Game: another bleak fictional world is being turned into competitive reality television. In the midst of season 2 of Fallout, Amazon has announced a new series called Fallout Shelter. According to a casting call, the show will put competitors inside of Fallout's iconic vaults and then test their survival skills in a […]

item.title: La PS5 Slim avec 1 To de stockage revient en promotion lors des soldes d’hiver
item.description: La console de Sony, la PlayStation 5 dans sa version Slim avec lecteur Blu-Ray, entre elle aussi dans la valse des soldes. Au programme : un pack qui réunit la console, 1 To de SSD, et le bundle cosmétique exclusif Flowering Chaos pour Fortnite. Avec l'aide d'un code promo, l'ensemble passe de 549 euros à 499 euros chez Cdiscount

item.title: The company behind quantum dots says that its OLED-crushing new TV tech should arrive in 2029 — could this beat inkjet OLED and microLED to be the next big thing?
item.description: QD-EL works like OLED, but could be brighter and more efficient – and it may not be a pip-dream any more

item.title: The Animal Crossing: New Horizons 3 expansion has arrived earlier than expected
item.description: For a number of very obvious reasons, we don’t want to roll back the clock to early 2020. No thank you. But if there was a feel-good lockdown story, it was the perfectly timed arrival of Animal Crossing: New Horizons, which allowed friends who could no longer meet up IRL to do so virtually on their carefully pruned islands.The game will almost certainly never be as popular as it was back then again, but Nintendo is hoping a good chunk of lapsed islanders will return for its latest DLC drop, which arrived on January 14, a day earlier than planned. The Switch 2 update went live as expected on Ja...

item.title: IBM wants to give businesses and governments more control over AI data
item.description: Enterprises and governments can build, deploy, and manage AI-ready sovereign environments with IBM Sovereign Core.

item.title: How to claim Verizon's $20 credit for Wednesday's service outage
item.description: Verizon is offering a very small mea culpa after Wednesday's massive outage, which drew more than 1.5 million reports on Downdetector and lasted hours. The carrier posted on X that it will offer a $20 credit, but customers must redeem it in the myVerizon app. "This credit isn’t meant to make up for what happened. No credit really can," the company wrote. "But it’s a way of acknowledging your time and showing that this matters to us." Incensed customers have largely replied with incredulity, both at the miniscule amount, and that it isn't being applied automatically. Engadget has reached out to...

item.title: Rumor claims Nvidia has 'essentially killed off' the RTX 5070 Ti and 5060 Ti 16GB – possibly leaving AMD free to dominate mid-range GPUs
item.description: You might want to move fast to grab a mid-range GPU, if you're after an Nvidia card, that is.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X Says It Will (Sort of) Crack Down on Grok’s Sexual Deepfake Problem
item.description: The company claims it’s adding new technical and geo-based restrictions to its Grok's image editing capabilties.

item.title: Raspberry Pi 5 : cette extension permet de faire tourner Llama, Mistral ou DeepSeek localement
item.description: L'exécution locale de modèles d'IA (LLM) n'est plus réservée aux gros GPU. Raspberry Pi dégaine son AI HAT+ 2, une carte d'extension qui promet de faire tourner Llama 3.2 ou DeepSeek directement sur votre PC, sans connexion internet. Le secret ? Une puce dédiée et surtout, sa propre mémoire vive.

item.title: T. Rex Took Its Sweet Time Getting Huge
item.description: A comprehensive analysis of Tyrannosaurus rex fossils is surprising scientists with just how long these apex predators took to become big boys.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver : les meilleures offres de la 2e démarque en DIRECT avec Amazon, Fnac, Darty…
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver ont commencé la semaine dernière et nous voici déjà à la deuxième démarque ! Au programme : encore plus d'offres pour des produits Tech à prix cassés, que ce soient les smartphones, les tablettes, les téléviseurs 4K, et surtout les ordinateurs portables, gaming ou de bureautique.

item.title: Square Enix confirms a new Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade update for PS5 and PC will arrive alongside the Nintendo Switch 2 and Xbox versions
item.description: Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade is set to receive a free PS5 and PC update that will add Streamline Progression, the same day the Nintendo Switch 2 and Xbox editions release.

item.title: The Dead Have Something to Scream About in ‘The Bride!’ Trailer
item.description: Maggie Gyllenhaal directs Jessie Buckley and Christian Bale in the punk-infused monster romance hitting theaters March 6.

item.title: So you watched The Bride! trailer — here are 3 movies you need to stream before its release
item.description: Maggie Gyllenhaal's next movie The Bride! just released its first trailer, and it reminds me of these three classic movies – here's where to stream them.

item.title: Microsoft is closing its employee library and cutting back on subscriptions
item.description: Microsoft's library of books is so heavy that it once caused a campus building to sink, according to an unproven legend among employees. Now those physical books, journals, and reports, and many of Microsoft's digital subscriptions to leading US newspapers, are disappearing in a shift described inside Microsoft as an "AI-powered learning experience." Microsoft started […]...

item.title: Xreal sues Viture over AR glasses patent
item.description: You know a gadget category is starting to go mainstream when patent lawsuits start cropping up. Today, Xreal filed a lawsuit in the US against Viture, alleging the firm is infringing on a patent for its AR glasses technology. According to Xreal's press release, the suit was filed in the United States District Court for […]

item.title: AI-related layoffs keep coming. But there’s more to the story.
item.description: We’re barely into the new year, and companies are shedding more jobs due to AI. But experts say that’s not the omen you think it is. In 2025, employers cited artificial intelligence as the rationale for nearly 55,000 layoffs at companies like Amazon and Microsoft. And with the new year barely underway, we’re already seeing a new crop of AI-related job cuts. ...

item.title: ChatGPT put a weird idea into our heads about how AI should look and act
item.description: In 2026, tools like Anthropic’s Cowork will reframe AIs as coworkers, and the ‘chatbot’ paradigm will begin to fade. Welcome to AI Decoded, Fast Company’s weekly newsletter that breaks down the most important news in the world of AI. I’m Mark Sullivan, a senior writer at Fast Company, covering emerging tech, AI, and tech policy.

item.title: The US imposes 25% tariff on Nvidia’s H200 AI chips headed to China
item.description: The Trump administration formalized its 25% cut of H200 chip sales in China with a tariff that applies to certain semiconductors.

item.title: The best Fitbits for your fitness and health
item.description: Despite being acquired by Google five years ago, Fitbit remains one of the most recognizable names in the industry. While its products aren’t designed with hardcore athletes, Fitbit makes excellent devices for tracking overall activity as well as monitoring certain health and wellness metrics, like EKGs and blood oxygen levels. That said, we’re still in […]...

item.title: Sony, JBL, OnePlus, Pixel Buds, Jabra, Bose : mettez à jour vos écouteurs d’urgence pour bloquer « WhisperPair »
item.description: Vous voyez cette petite fenêtre magique qui apparaît sur votre téléphone quand vous ouvrez vos écouteurs ? C'est génial. Sauf que des chercheurs viennent de prouver que cette "magie" permet à n'importe qui de prendre le contrôle de vos appareils en 15 secondes. On appelle ça WhisperPair, et c'est beaucoup plus grave qu'un simple bug.

item.title: Palo Alto patches a worrying security issue which could crash your firewall without even logging in
item.description: A high-severity flaw was found in GlobalProtect Gateway and Portal and was promptly fixed.

item.title: Quelle est la meilleure barre de son testée par Frandroid en 2026 ?
item.description: Pour passer des soirées TV agréables et plus immersives, investir dans une barre de son est une excellente idée. Dans notre guide d'achat, nous avons réuni les meilleures barres de son que nous avons pu tester.

item.title: I cloned a ‘digital twin’ of myself with AI. He’s convincing enough to fool my mom
item.description: Just because we can make replicas of ourselves, should we? I was born an only child, but now I have a twin. He’s an exact duplicate of me—down to my clothing, my home, my facial expressions, and even my voice.

item.title: ISS Loses 4 Astronauts Overnight. Can This Skeleton Crew Keep It Running?
item.description: There are only three astronauts left on the International Space Station now that Crew-11 is back on Earth. Should we be worried?

item.title: Grok blocked from undressing images in places where it’s illegal after global backlash
item.description: Elon Musk’s company, xAI, now says it will geoblock content if it violates laws in a particular place. Elon Musk’s AI chatbot Grok won’t be able to edit photos to portray real people in revealing clothing in places where that is illegal, according to a statement posted on X.

item.title: Piratage des matchs de Ligue 1 : la justice impose aux VPN de bloquer de nouveaux sites
item.description: Les fournisseurs de VPN sont une fois de plus tenus de bloquer plusieurs noms de domaine diffusant illégalement des compétitions sportives en France. Cette fois, c'est la Ligue de football professionnel (LFP) qui est allée au charbon auprès du tribunal judiciaire de Paris, avec succès.

item.title: Want to read in color in 2026? The Kindle Colorsoft is now under $200
item.description: As of Jan. 15, the Kindle Colorsoft is now $50 off at Amazon. Get the speedy and convenient color e-reader from Amazon and start reading in color.

item.title: OpenAI invests in Sam Altman’s brain computer interface startup Merge Labs
item.description: OpenAI is participating in a $250 million seed round into Merge Labs, Sam Altman's brain computer interface startup. The startup is valued at $850 million.

item.title: "No meaningful changes" – Venezuelans still need a VPN to access X
item.description: Digital rights group debunks rumors that the X ban has been lifted in Venezuela and confirms that there has not been any meaningful changes to the country's internet censorship practices since Maduro's capture.

item.title: Noodles & Company is closing 30 more restaurants: List of doomed locations grows in 2026
item.description: The fast-casual noodle eatery is reducing its physical footprint yet again. It’s just the latest retailer to start the new year with new closures. Noodles & Company is set to close additional restaurants. In a January 12 press release, Noodles & Company announced plans to close between 30 and 35 restaurants in 2026, with the aim of improving financial health and profitability....

item.title: Wikimedia announces AI partners including Meta and Microsoft
item.description: As part of Wikipedia's 25th anniversary, parent company Wikimedia announced a slew of partnerships with AI-focused companies like Amazon, Meta, Perplexity, Microsoft and others. The deals are meant to alleviate some of the cost associated with AI chatbots accessing Wikipedia content in enormous volumes by giving the tech companies streamlined access. As noted by The Verge, the timeline on these deals is a little squirrely. The Wikipedia foundation says that several companies became enterprise partners "over the past year," while listing Amazon, Google and Meta as "existing" partners. It appea...

item.title: Look out Mint - Metro by T-Mobile's new deal gets you an unlimited data plan for just $25 per month
item.description: Metro by T-Mobile has just debuted its best-ever batch of deals for new customers this week, with seriously cheap plans across the board.

item.title: Indie RPG Sea of Stars hits iOS and Android on April 7
item.description: The indie RPG Sea of Stars is being released for mobile platforms on April 7. The iOS and Android versions are priced at just $10, which is a steal considering it cost $35 when it was first released for PC and consoles. Heck, it still costs that much on many platforms. This is a mobile release, so it's not an exact port. The interface has been revamped to allow for complete touch control. It's also compatible with controllers, which is always a good thing with smartphone ports. The Android version has a couple of unique features. It offers Google Play Games achievements and cloud saves across ...

item.title: Valerion généralise la fonction anti-arc-en-ciel sur toute sa gamme de vidéoprojecteurs
item.description: Le vidéoprojecteur Valerion VisionMaster Max dispose d’une fonction particulièrement intéressante pour les personnes qui sont sensibles aux effets arc-en-ciel produits par les modèles DLP. Désormais, via une mise à jour, tous les vidéoprojecteurs de la marque vont en profiter.

item.title: Big OpenAI leak claims the ChatGPT maker is developing an earbud-style wearable with a surprising twist
item.description: OpenAI’s next wearable looks like Apple’s AirPods and will give you constant access to ChatGPT.

item.title: Animal Crossing New Horizons : la version Switch 2 améliore grandement ces deux points
item.description: L'opus Switch d'Animal Crossing sorti en 2020 a droit à une version remis au goût du jour pour la Switch 2. Et il y a une vraie différence.

item.title: ASUS has stopped producing the RTX 5070 Ti and 5060 Ti 16GB, saying they've reached 'end of life'
item.description: YouTube channel Hardware Unboxed is reporting that NVIDIA has “effectively” discontinued the RTX 5070 Ti and 5060 Ti 16GB due to the ongoing memory crunch. In its most recent video, the channel states ASUS “explicitly” told it the RTX 5070 Ti is “currently facing a supply shortage.” As a result, the company has “placed the model into end of life status,” and no longer plans to produce it. Hardware Unboxed also spoke to retailers in Australia, who told the channel the 5070 Ti is “no longer available to purchase from partners and distributors,” adding they expect that to be the case throughout a...

item.title: En 2026, le jeu vidéo sur Linux va faire un bond de géant en ray tracing
item.description: Et si vous jouiez en ray tracing sur Linux ? La communauté s'active pour optimiser très nettement les performances des jeux modernes, y compris sur Unreal Engine 5.

item.title: The Mega Pokémon Kanto Region Trio build is on sale for under $20 at Amazon
item.description: The Mega Pokémon Kanto Region Trio build is on sale at Amazon for $19.62, down from the list price of $34.96. That's a 44% discount.

item.title: 2016 is back in fashion — here are the phones we were using for Vine, Snapchat filters, and Pokemon Go

item.description: Mullvad has officially taken its OpenVPN servers offline, ending support for the legacy protocol and pushing all users to WireGuard. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Un cloud souverain pour l’Europe… opéré par l’américain Amazon
item.description: Un cloud souverain européen peut-il être… américain ? C'est la quadrature du cercle qu'Amazon Web Services tente de résoudre avec l'annonce d'une nouvelle infrastructure indépendante et hébergée au sein de l'Union européenne, loin des yeux d'un Oncle Sam avec qui la confiance est rompue.

item.title: Is Starlink authoritarian-proof?
item.description: The Iranian protests are just the latest global conflict where Elon Musk’s Starlink has become a vital communication conduit. But will the service always hold up in the face of authoritarian regimes—and to Musk’s whims? Satellite communications networks have proved resilient amid a crackdown.

item.title: ‘This credit isn’t meant to make up for what happened. No credit really can’: Verizon is offering a $20 credit after its major outage — but will it be enough?

item.title: Asus ROG Kithara : un casque gaming vraiment audiophile ?
item.description: Présenté au CES 2026, le ROG Kithara marque une nouvelle incursion d'Asus dans le segment des casques gaming audiophiles. Fruit d'une collaboration avec le spécialiste Hifiman, ce modèle filaire adopte des composants haut de gamme pour offrir une qualité sonore digne d'un équipement haute-fidélité.
